data.headline: Experienced UX Designer and Researcher
data.summary: Passionate UX designer with 8+ years of experience creating user-centric digital solutions for academic and research-driven organizations.

experience.title: Senior UX Designer
bullets: Led the redesign of the university's online learning platform, improving user engagement and satisfaction by 30%
Conducted extensive user research, including interviews, surveys, and usability testing, to inform the design process
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to translate user insights into intuitive and accessible digital experiences
Mentored junior designers and provided training on best practices in UX design

experience.title: UX Designer
bullets: Designed and implemented the user interface for a new data visualization tool, resulting in a 25% increase in user adoption
Facilitated workshops with researchers to understand their needs and pain points, and translated these insights into design solutions
Collaborated with developers to ensure seamless integration of UX design into the technical implementation

experience.title: UX Design Intern
bullets: Conducted user research and usability testing to identify areas for improvement in the organization's web-based applications
Designed and prototyped new interface concepts, incorporating feedback from end-users
Participated in cross-functional team meetings to align on project goals and timelines

interests: Exploring emerging technologies in user experience design
Volunteering for non-profit organizations focused on digital accessibility
Attending design conferences and workshops to stay up-to-date on industry trends
data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Emilie Dubois, an experienced UX designer with a warm, friendly expression, wearing a smart casual outfit against a plain background.
